ch0293_00_button/0101_0701_01_10:
H-hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you
heading out somewhere again today?
ch0293_00_button/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll come help right away if you have any trouble
with machines and computers and stuff...
ch0293_00_button/7101_0701_01_10:
You ever wonder what kind of system manages
this vast artificial island?
ch0293_00_button/7101_0701_02_10:
I kinda wanna see for myself how strong the
security is...
ch0293_00_button/7101_0701_03_10: No, I definitely won’t do any hacking and stuff...
ch0293_00_button/7102_0701_01_10:
I was in the STEM track back at my school
in Paldea.
ch0293_00_button/7102_0701_02_10:
Well, I’m actually still in my first year. I have to
repeat a year because I caused some trouble.
ch0293_00_button/7102_0701_03_10:
I’ll need to take my classes seriously once I’m back
in school...
ch0293_00_button/7103_0701_02_10:
I prefer to be indoors, so I don’t know much about
our tourist spots and stuff.
ch0293_00_button/7103_0701_03_10:
Oh, but...I think I’ve heard about some ruins
getting destroyed.
ch0293_00_button/7104_0701_01_10:
Th-the Trainers on this island are quite
outspoken...
ch0293_00_button/7104_0701_02_10:
They all love Pokémon battles and are
really energetic...
ch0293_00_button/7104_0701_03_10: They kinda give me classic Nemona energy...
ch0293_00_button/7105_0701_01_10:
Even if you face a challenge you can’t overcome
on your own, you can succeed if you work as
a team.
ch0293_00_button/7105_0701_03_10: That’s why I’m glad we’re on the same team...
ch0293_00_button/1701_0701_01_10: Uh, hey. I’m from the supply unit... Just kidding...
ch0293_00_button/1701_0701_02_10:
I thought you might be short on some stuff.
So, here...
ch0293_00_button/2501_0701_01_10:
There’s an independent study thing at my school
where you go find your very own treasure.
ch0293_00_button/2501_0701_02_10:
The purpose of the study is... Well, it can
be anything.
ch0293_00_button/2501_0701_03_10: The treasure I found was...my closest friends.
ch0293_00_button/2501_0701_04_10:
That includes everyone in Team Star, and lately I
think I’ve gained a few more friends...
ch0293_00_button/2501_0702_01_10: Do you, uh, have anything you treasure, too?
ch0293_00_button/2501_0702_02_10: If you do...take good care of it.
ch0293_00_button/2511_0701_01_10: I used to be kind of a loner in my class at school.
ch0293_00_button/2511_0701_02_10:
My hands tremble just thinking back to
those days...
ch0293_00_button/2511_0701_03_10:
I created Team Star so I could get rid of bullying
and stuff.
ch0293_00_button/2511_0702_01_10:
I-if I ever see someone on Pasio being left out...
I wanna help them...
ch0293_00_button/2511_0702_02_10: You’ll help me out if that ever happens...right?
ch0293_00_button/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early isn’t too bad, I guess. Though a
strict lifestyle isn’t really my thing...
ch0293_00_button/3003_0701_01_10:
This island is full of people walking around with
Veevees... Is this paradise?
ch0293_00_button/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s late, so I’ll be heading off. Hasta la vistar... ★
That sign-off is so cringe...
